headline: New Product Launch Success
description: Strategic launch campaign with aggressive keyword targeting followed by efficiency optimization.

author.name: Bilal Hassan
author.quote: TACoS reduced from 109% to 43% in 60 days.

details.challenge: Launch new product in competitive niche, achieve rankings, and maintain profitability.
details.solution: Strategic launch campaign with aggressive keyword targeting, followed by optimization phase focusing on efficiency.
details.results: September: $2,339 sales (aggressive). October: $2,789 sales (efficient). TACoS reduced to 43.86%.
